definitions.definition: The state of being adopted; the acceptance of a child of other parents as if he or she were one's own child.
definitions.example: A Chinese baby girl was given away for adoption.

definitions.definition: Admission to an institution, for example a hospital, clinic, mental asylum.
definitions.example: the adoption of people into hospitals or monasteries

definitions.definition: The choosing and making that to be one's own which originally was not so; acceptance
Transfer between an old system to another (usually better) system.
definitions.example: Our company is considering the adoption of a four-day week.

definitions.definition: An act of divine grace by which the redeemed in Christ are admitted to the privileges of the sons of God.
Ten consecutive wins against an opponent.
